Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to military leave for all represented and non represented persons employed by the port authority of New York and New Jersey
Summary: Provides for military leave for all represented and non-represented persons employed by the port authority of New York and New Jersey.
LawSection: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
LawCode: Add Art XXIII, ยง1 of Chap 154 of 1921
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 154 of the laws of 1921, relating to the port authority of New York and New Jersey, in relation to military leave for all represented and non-represented persons employed by the port authority of New York and New Jersey
